Identification_Area.title: ROSETTA-ORBITER CHECK MIDAS 3 CR2 PC1-2 V1.0

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Riedler, W. et al., MIDAS - The Micro-Imaging Dust Analysis System for the Rosetta Mission, Space Sci. Rev., 128(1-4), 869-904, Feb. 2007.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: ROSETTA-ORBITER CHECK MIDAS 3 CR2 PC1-2 V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: K. Torkar, H. Jeszenszky and J. Romstedt, Payload Checkout 1-2 Data 1.0, RO-X-MIDAS-3-CR2-PC1-2-V1.0, NASA Planetary Data System, 2008.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Data from the Micro-Imaging Dust Analysis System of the ROSETTA Orbiter collected in the CRUISE 2 mission phase.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: The Micro-Imaging Dust Analysis System (MIDAS) is an instrument on the ROSETTA Orbiter that will provide 3D images and statistical parameters of pristine cometary particles hitting the detector. This data set includes all data from the CRUISE 2 mission phase.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
This dataset includes MIDAS data from the payload checkouts #1 and #2:
Scenario ID Date (YYDDDHH) Observation description ----------------------------------------------------------------------
PC1 (passive) 1 0527405-0527409 MIDAS passive C/O part A 2 0527723-0527803 MIDAS passive C/O part B
PC2 (passive) 1 0606318-0606321 MIDAS passive C/O part A 2 0606717-0606720 MIDAS passive C/O part B
The images included in the passive checkout observations have been taken without approaching the surface and do not contain any meaningful data.
